name: Cartoon-comic-style Komodo Dragon, Original Painting
description:
Komodo dragons have thrived in the harsh climate of Indonesia's Lesser Sunda Islands, unbeknownst to humans until about 100 years ago. Reaching 10 feet (3 meters) in length and more than 300 pounds (136 kilograms), Komodo Dragons are the heaviest lizards on Earth. They have long, flat heads with rounded snouts, scaly skin, bowed legs, and huge, muscular tails.

However, they are also adorable, as depicted in my painting, here. This is a cute little outdoors-wildlife-safari-style 8x10'' painting done with Academy acrylics and coated with a clear, flat, UV-resistant matte finish to protect the design/colors.

Thanks for looking, and check out www.sorrylittlesharky.com for more crazy artwork!

***If you are outside of the United States, please contact me and I'll gladly put together a quote for shipping this piece to your country. ***

name: "Shattered Path" Glass Artwork, Panel Painting, dotted lines, etched, dark, green, swirls, abstract
description:
This is a uniquely designed and hand-crafted piece of painted glass artwork called "Shattered Path". As you can see, there are multiple designs featured---including dotted consecutive swirls, antiquarian crackling, dark and light drips, and quaint, imperfect circles. 

This was coated with Krylon triple-thick crystal clear gloss glaze to protect the iridescence of the colors/etched designs. Dimensions are roughly 12.5 inches by 6 inches. 

DISCLAIMER: *Not responsible* for injuries sustained as a result of ill use of this item. "Ill Use" will hereafter be defined as engaging in any of the following activities with this item, including but not limited to:
-Using as writing surface. 
-slitting wrists with the glass. 
-going sledding with the glass. 
-Committing murder with the glass. 
-Using glass as a trendy new style of hat. 

Feel free to ask questions. Thanks for looking, and check out my website, www.sorrylittlesharky.com

name: "Bloody Murder" Glass Panel Artwork, Painting, blood, etched, blue, green, red, swirls, abstract
description:
This is a uniquely designed and hand-crafted piece of painted glass artwork called "Bloody Murder".  As you can see, there are multiple designs featured, all obnoxiously competing for your coveted attention; some are disturbed, jagged lil’ etched swirls, some are multicolored splats and splotches, some are variations of dotted lines and spider webs, etc. 

This piece was coated with Krylon triple-thick clear gloss glaze to protect the colors/etched designs. Dimensions are 6.5 inches by 11 inches. 

Honestly there is a LOT more detail than the pictures are able to convey, so if you're interested, I'll e-mail you higher res photos of this work. 

DISCLAIMER: *Not responsible* for injuries sustained as a result of ill use of this item. "Ill Use" will hereafter be defined as engaging in any of the following activities with this item, including but not limited to:
-cutting self with the glass. 
-Sitting on the glass. 
-Brushing the dog with the glass. 
-Using glass as Frisbee at the park. 
-Using glass as pillow at bedtime. 
-Ingestion of the glass. 
-Smashing the glass over spouse’s head during heated argument. 

Feel free to ask questions. I'd be glad to ship to other countries, provided you contact me before purchasing so that I can put together an accurate quote!

Thanks for looking...and check out my website, www.sorrylittlesharky.com

name: Dead Of Winter, Original Acrylic Painting, vivid blue, woods, abstract, landscape
description:
Dead Of Winter: very abstract, trees and forest, looks like a dream world of blue and little spirits can be seen rising out of the shadows, howling. Look close and you'll see. One of a kind piece, very rich, dark, and colorful blues. Coated with a clear, gloss, UV-resistant matte finish to protect the design/colors. 16'' x 20''.

****If you are outside of the United States, please contact me and I'll gladly put together a quote for shipping this piece to your country. Thank you!

Thanks for looking, and check out www.sorrylittlesharky.com for more crazy artwork!

name: It Is Rife With Ambiguity, abstract, autumn, fall, dark, blue, green, purple
description:
“IT IS RIFE WITH AMBIGUITY”

Aptly named, this one-of-a-kind and original acrylic painting is an odd but captivating marriage of colorful abstract imagery with a touch of woodland beauty. Trenchant purples, deep greens, electric blues, plenty of shadows, and a fascinating blend of autumn tones come together here. The blue you see is a metallic paint with iridescent properties and adds a very unique effect to the piece. Measures 12 x 24’’. 

***Please inform me if you are outside of the United States before bidding/buying, I would be glad to work with you on the cost of shipping! ***

And I’m always looking forward to doing commission work, let me know if you’re interested in having a custom piece done.

WEBSITE: www.sorrylittlesharky.com
